blogPost.title: What’s your message to ambitious professionals who are unsure about having children? Answer by Daisy Dowling, the author of Workparent. https://t.co/chFceDT4QS https://t.co/jCvNLQ6Zbu
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 子どもを持つことを迷っている意欲的な社会人にメッセージをお願いします。Workparent』の著者、デイジー・ダウリングさんの回答です。https://t.co/chFceDT4QS https://t.co/jCvNLQ6Zbu
你对那些不确定是否要生孩子的雄心勃勃的专业人士有什么建议？回答者：Daisy Dowling，《Workparent》的作者。https://t.co/chFceDT4QS https://t.co/jCvNLQ6Zbu
你對那些不確定是否要生孩子的雄心勃勃的專業人士有什麼建議？回答者：Daisy Dowling，《Workparent》的作者。https://t.co/chFceDT4QS https://t.co/jCvNLQ6Zbu

previous.title: What are the top traits of a successful entrepreneur? Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav

localize.full_text: 成功する起業家の特徴とは？Answer by @CWaltersPhD, Business & Branding Mentor, Corporate Training. https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav
成功企业家的首要特征是什么？回答者：@CWaltersPhD，商业& 品牌导师，企业培训。https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav
成功企業家的首要特徵是什麼？回答者：@CWaltersPhD，商業& 品牌導師，企業培訓。https://t.co/vqGBphiZbL https://t.co/gyD8C1aJav

next.title: How do you build an authentic workplace culture in a remote environment? Answer by @hollysirkin, Vice President of People at Unison. https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/34Yl24fu9s

localize.full_text: リモート環境で本物の職場文化を構築するには？回答者：@hollysirkin, Vice President of People at Unison. https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/34Yl24fu9s
如何在远程环境中建立一个真实的工作场所文化？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副总裁。https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/34Yl24fu9s
如何在遠程環境中建立一個真實的工作場所文化？回答者：@hollysirkin，Unison的人事副總裁。https://t.co/SNVZOZN0rp https://t.co/34Yl24fu9s
